docs.title: Homepage
docs.text:
This website was deployed by using MKDocs and

Material for MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

Material for MkDocs For full documentation visit [https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material] (https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/)

docs.title: Lessons learned and troubleshooting done while installing MKDocs
docs.text:
-- Used the following video to setup MkDocs How to set up Material for MkDocs by @james-willett – 15m – Learn how to create and host a documentation site using Material for MkDocs on GitHub Pages in a step-by-step guide.

-- The setup did work great until I had to update the main branch on Github Pages and the ci.yml workflow file did not trigger the creation of gh-pages for publication on the website under Github Pages
